short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the current page on a server to have access to the page as a permanant file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension copies and pastes the page you are currently visiting to a server. Then it gives you a permanent link that you can send to your friends!
